wordpressPost.title: Jamie xx, Chvrches and Stormzy added to Øya line-up
wordpressPost.excerpt: 50% of the week passes already sold!
wordpressPost.content:
JAMIE XX (UK) – Thursday 11th of August

CHVRCHES (UK) – Friday 12th of August

STORMZY (UK)

Three very hot British acts are confirmed for next year’s Øya festival. They join already confirmed names like M83, Foals, AURORA, Ane Brun, Lush and Neurosis.

Half of the week passes for Øyafestivalen are already sold. We will be announcing more acts in January.

photo Flavien Prioreau
